sub_title: Private Equity Associate at Middleground | Ex McKinsey
summary:
Experienced Private Equity professional with a demonstrated history of working on (i) Digital & IT, (ii) Pricing, Operations, & Procurement, and (iii) Organization & Transformation.

Passionate, 360-degree curious, organized, eager to grow, natural born team player with a clear plan for the future. Excellent communicator, effective negotiator, and result-oriented seller. Outgoing and impactful when working with others. Excited about strategy, investments, management consulting, supply chain, technology, and finance.

Previously, Operations Manager Intern at Amazon (Edinburgh), Instock Manager Intern at Amazon (Milan), Sales & Trading Intern at HSBC (London), Business Analyst at McKinsey & Company (Milan), and Private Equity Associate at Argos Wityu (Milan). Currently Private Equity Associate at Middleground Capital (Amsterdam). BBA and M.Sc. in International Management with honours at Bocconi, CEMS graduate. Places lived: Fano (18y), Montréal (4m), Edinburgh (3m), Helsinki (5m), London (3m), Milan (9y), and Amsterdam (since Feb 23). International mindset and love for multicultural workplaces present.

projects.title: Business Intelligence at IBM - Case study
projects.description: As part of our Business Intelligence course, we had to work on a real case study provided by IBM Finland. We used IBM Cognos and IBM Watson Analytics in order to prepare a business case on sales data from a retail company and propose innovations in their sales strategy.

projects.title: Accenture Strategy Global Case Challenge World Finals
projects.description:
We participated in the World Finals of Accenture Strategy Global Case Challenge in London.
The aim of the project was to reduce the number of doctors and patients dying because of terrorist attacks in war zones. We developed a proposal including delocalisation of hospitals, remote care and a software to find - through drones images - the safest route and locations for ambulances and hospitals.

projects.title: Accenture Strategy Global Case Challenge
projects.description:
We competed with very smart and able students from top North Italian universities and interacted with top managers from Accenture Strategy Milan.
We won the regional phase and moved up to the national one.
The Global Case Challenge is a program that gives students the chance to work with and compete against other student teams from around the world. The task of GCC 2017 was to help Médecins Sans Frontières in transforming its digital strategy, using technology to inspire and engage supporters during humanitarian crises.

projects.title: SONEM entrepreneurial project
projects.description:
We developed through a lean startup approach the idea of a new app (a Social Network Moderator) and tested it in the market. We revisited many times our business model until we reached a satisfying Minimum Viable Product (MVP). In the end we presented the work done in front of the class.
Relator: Professor Carlo Salvato

projects.title: Enhancing the City of Helsinki services for entrepreneurs
projects.description: As part of our course on Sustainable Entrepreneurship, we had to interview entrepreneurs in the city of Helsinki and run a questionnaire to entrepreneurs. Afterwards, we gathered insights on how can the city of Helsinki improve its service offerings and presented this at the Sustainable Entrepreneurship Day in front of a large number of stakeholders.
